title: 2220 N Geneva Terrace 1/2 block from Oz Park! 3 bd 2 ba
map_address: 2220 N Geneva Terrace near Webster Ave
posting_body: ['Spacious 3 bedroom / 2 bath in Prime Lincoln Park location.', ' Across the street from Oz Park, Target, Divvy bike Oz Park station, Dairy Queen, restaurants and bars on Lincoln, Webster, nearby Halsted and Clark.', ' Short walk to CTA Red Line Fullerton stop.', ' 1 mile walk to Fullerton Beach!', ' Easy walk to CTA 22, 36 and 151 bus stops.', 'Avail 9/1/22', 'This beautiful three bed/two bath unit features a spacious open concept living and dining area plus a huge kitchen with  massive island.', ' Antique marble fireplace.', ' Extremely high ceilings.', ' Great window lit living room.', 'Hardwood flooring throughout, two full baths, in unit washer/dryer and central AC.', 'Great kitchen with stove and oven, microwave, refrigerator, ample cabinetry, cooking/eating island, double sink.', 'Water included.']
